MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the SY23 postcode area of Aberystwyth, affecting properties in New Cross and surrounding area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 11.12AM. Our engineers are on site making repairs to a broken overhead electrical cable and our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 6.00PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 5.00PM on 11th March 2021.
